name: TVInterfaceCreating
desc: A protocol that defines methods used to create views and view controllers.

items.name: func resourceImage(name: String) -> UIImage?
items.desc: Returns the image for the given resource

items.name: func resourceURL(name: String) -> URL?
items.desc: Returns a URL for the given resource.

items.name: func makeViewController(element: TVViewElement, existingViewController: UIViewController?) -> UIViewController?
items.desc: Returns a view controller for a view element.

items.name: func makeView(element: TVViewElement, existingView: UIView?) -> UIView?
items.desc: Returns a view for a view element.

items.name: func collectionViewCellClass(for: TVViewElement) -> AnyClass?
items.desc: Returns a collection view cell for the specified element.

items.name: func playerViewController(for: TVPlayer) -> UIViewController?
items.desc: Returns the custom player user interface for a custom player.
